citations.narrative:
Two nine-week old serval kittens were on exhibit. The exhibitor license did not allow for exhibiting exotic or wild felids. The
licensee must immediately discontinue exhibiting the servals (they were taken off exhibit at time of inspection). Licensee
must acquire a new license that will include the exhibiting of wild/exotic felids before exhibiting any such animals per the
Animal Welfare Act licensing requirements to ensure that proper knowledge, containment, safety and care will be
provided for the animal and safety of the public.
* To be corrected: From this day (March 7, 2024) forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.1(b)(2)(ii) 
   
Requirements and application 
Two nine-week old serval kittens were on exhibit. The exhibitor license did not allow for exhibiting exotic or wild felids. The 
licensee must immediately discontinue exhibiting the servals (they were taken off exhibit at time of inspection). Licensee 
must acquire a new license that will include the exhibiting of wild/exotic felids before exhibiting any such animals per the 
Animal Welfare Act licensing requirements to ensure that proper knowledge, containment, safety and care will be 
provided for the animal and safety of the public.  
 
* To be corrected: From this day (March 7, 2024) forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative. 
 
 n
